short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A better way to organize and share links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revolutionize link management! Save, describe, & categorize links in custom folders. Effortlessly sync to your treetrav profile for a tidy, and organized browsing experience.
